duties_responsibilities.duty: Travel through assigned areas to call on accounts and check inventory for delivery needs.
Communicate with customers to evaluate needs and maintain daily product reporting.
Source, upsell, and build relationships with new and existing customers.
Provide daily support for sales efforts and account maintenance functions.
Ensure accurate inventory count and communicate with warehouse personnel for order release.

education_certification.credential: High school degree or equivalent required, 1-2 years of relevant experience preferred.
